name: Winter Snowcraft
description:
Live the life of a snowball as you grow and build your own snowman in winterlands!

Complete the adventure from a tiny snowball to the gigantic mass of snow. But be careful, dangerous lava swamp lies ahead, can you survive it?

Game was created during epic megajam 2019

tiny list of pre-made assets used:

from Unreal Engine Marketplace:

Autumn Audio Bundle, Infinity Blade: Effects, Infinity Blade: Ice Lands, Mega Game Music Collection, Megascans Iceland Collection Vol. 1, Megascans Iceland Collection Vol. 2, Megascans Iceland Collection Vol. 3, Modular Cliffs, Water Materials.

from texturehaven.com:

snow_02, snow_01.
